summary: A comprehensive suite of unit tests for the Dask bag library, covering core bag creation and transformation, aggregation, partitioning, serialization, lazy evaluation, and various I/O formats (Avro, text) as well as random sampling utilities, to verify correct behavior across typical and edgeâ€‘case scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and correctness of Dask bag's parallel data processing capabilities for users building scalable analytics pipelines, reducing bugs and regressions in production workloads.
